mil5.2.4:3.3_0: ratanasuttaṁ mettasuttaṁ khandhaparittaṁ moraparittaṁ dhajaggaparittaṁ āṭānāṭiyaparittaṁ aṅgulimālaparittaṁ.
mil5.2.4:3.5_0: Yadi parittakaraṇena maccupāsā parimutti bhavati, tena hi ‘na antalikkhe …pe…
mil5.2.4:3.7_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho gaṇṭhitopi gaṇṭhitaro tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.2.4:4.2_2: tañca pana sāvasesāyukassa vayasampannassa apetakammāvaraṇassa, natthi, mahārāja,
mil5.2.4:4.2_3: khīṇāyukassa ṭhitiyā kiriyā vā upakkamo vā.
mil5.2.4:5.1_1: matassa rukkhassa sukkhassa koḷāpassa nisnehassa uparuddhajīvitassa gatāyusaṅkhārassa kumbhasahassenapi
mil5.2.4:5.1_2: udake ākirante allattaṁ vā pallavitaharitabhāvo vā na bhaveyya;
mil5.2.4:5.2_1: bhesajjaparittakammena natthi khīṇāyukassa ṭhitiyā kiriyā vā upakkamo vā,
mil5.2.4:6.1_1: kassako paripakke dhaññe mate sassanāḷe udakappavesanaṁ vāreyya,
mil5.2.4:6.1_2: yaṁ pana sassaṁ taruṇaṁ meghasannibhaṁ vayasampannaṁ,
mil5.2.4:6.2_2: ye pana te manussā sāvasesāyukā vayasampannā,
mil5.2.4:7.2_0: “Diṭṭhapubbo pana tayā, mahārāja, koci rogo bhesajjehi paṭinivattito”ti?
mil5.2.4:7.4_0: “Tena hi, mahārāja, ‘parittabhesajjakiriyā niratthakā’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā bhavatī”ti.
mil5.2.4:8.3_0: Tena tesaṁ pavattena sabbe byādhayo vūpasamanti, sabbā ītiyo apagacchantīti.
mil5.2.4:9.1_1: koci ahinā daṭṭho mantapadena visaṁ pātīyamāno visaṁ cikkhassanto uddhamadho ācamayamāno”ti?
mil5.2.4:9.3_0: “Tena hi, mahārāja, ‘parittabhesajjakiriyā niratthakā’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā bhavati.
mil5.2.4:10.1_1: ‘morassa kataparittassa sattavassasatāni luddako nāsakkhi pāsaṁ upanetuṁ,
mil5.2.4:10.1_2: akataparittassa taṁ yeva divasaṁ pāsaṁ upanesī’”ti?
mil5.2.4:10.2_0: “Āma, bhante, suyyati, abbhuggato so saddo sadevake loke”ti.
mil5.2.4:10.3_0: “Tena hi, mahārāja ‘parittabhesajjakiriyā niratthakā’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā bhavati.
mil5.2.4:11.1_1: ‘dānavo bhariyaṁ parirakkhanto samugge pakkhipitvā gilitvā kucchinā pariharati,
mil5.2.4:11.1_2: atheko vijjādharo tassa dānavassa mukhena pavisitvā tāya saddhiṁ abhiramati,
mil5.2.4:11.1_5: saha samugge vivaṭe vijjādharo yathākāmaṁ pakkāmī’”ti?
mil5.2.4:11.2_0: “Āma, bhante, suyyati, abbhuggato sopi saddo sadevake loke”ti.
mil5.2.4:11.3_0: “Nanu so, mahārāja, vijjādharo parittabalena gahaṇā mutto”ti.
mil5.2.4:12.1_1: ‘aparopi vijjādharo bārāṇasirañño antepure mahesiyā saddhiṁ sampaduṭṭho gahaṇappatto samāno khaṇena adassanaṁ gato mantabalenā’”ti.
mil5.2.4:12.3_0: “Nanu so, mahārāja, vijjādharo parittabalena gahaṇā mutto”ti?
mil5.2.4:13.3_0: “Tena hi, bhante nāgasena, parittaṁ na sabbatthikan”ti?
mil5.2.4:13.4_0: “Api nu kho, mahārāja, bhojanaṁ sabbesaṁ jīvitaṁ rakkhatī”ti?
mil5.2.4:13.7_0: “Yato, bhante, ekacce taṁyeva bhojanaṁ atibhuñjitvā visūcikāya marantī”ti.
mil5.2.4:13.8_0: “Tena hi, mahārāja, bhojanaṁ na sabbesaṁ jīvitaṁ rakkhatī”ti?
mil5.2.4:13.9_2: kāraṇehi bhojanaṁ jīvitaṁ harati atibhuttena vā usmādubbalatāya vā, āyudadaṁ,
mil5.2.4:13.10_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, parittaṁ ekacce rakkhati, ekacce na rakkhati.
mil5.2.4:14.1_0: Tīhi, mahārāja, kāraṇehi parittaṁ na rakkhati kammāvaraṇena, kilesāvaraṇena, asaddahanatāya.
mil5.2.4:14.2_1: parittaṁ attanā katena ārakkhaṁ jahati, yathā, mahārāja,
mil5.2.4:14.2_5: so aparena samayena paresaṁ putte akkosante vā paharante vā pahāraṁ deti.
mil5.2.4:14.3_0: Te tassa kujjhitvā parisāya ākaḍḍhitvā taṁ gahetvā sāmino upanenti,
mil5.2.4:14.3_1: yadi pana tassā putto aparaddho hoti velātivatto.
mil5.2.4:14.4_0: Atha naṁ sāmino manussā ākaḍḍhayamānā daṇḍamuggarajāṇumuṭṭhīhi tāḷenti pothenti,
mil5.2.4:14.4_2: tassa mātā labhati ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanaṁ gāhaṁ sāmino upanayanaṁ kātun”ti?
mil5.2.4:14.8_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, sattānaṁ ārakkhaṁ parittaṁ attano aparādhena vañjhaṁ karotī”ti.
